alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lewis County through 800 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boonville, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lyonsdale, Greig, Port Leyden, Lyons Falls, Constableville, Turin, Talcottville and Brantingham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
